    • globalCommand

      private static boolean globalCommand(String[] command)
      Handles request invocation for methods that can be invoked in almost any client state. It is a boolean method because the returned value will be used by the other methods to avoid triggering when global methods are invoked.
      Parameters:
      command - The current command
      Returns:
      True if one of the cases within the switch is invoked otherwise false

    • mainMenu
